Enums/SwiftQueueError.html#/s:10SwiftQue.abstract: Job canceled inside onError. Parameter contains the origin error

Enums/RetryConstraint.html#/s:10SwiftQue.abstract: Retry after a certain time. If set to 0 it will retry immediately

Enums/RetryConstraint.html#/s:10SwiftQue.abstract: Will not retry, onRemoved will be called immediately

Enums/NetworkType.html#/s:10SwiftQueue11.abstract: Job will run regardless the connectivity of the platform

Enums/NetworkType.html#/s:10SwiftQueue11.abstract: Requires at least cellular such as 2G, 3G, 4G, LTE or Wifi

Enums/NetworkType.html#/s:10SwiftQueue11.abstract: Device has to be connected to Wifi or Lan

Classes/SwiftQueueManagerBuilder.html#/s.name: set(isSuspended:)
Classes/SwiftQueueManagerBuilder.html#/s.abstract: Start jobs directly when they are scheduled or not. false by default

Classes/SwiftQueueManagerBuilder.html#/s.name: set(synchronous:)
Classes/SwiftQueueManagerBuilder.html#/s.abstract: Deserialize jobs synchronously after creating the SwiftQueueManager instance. true by default

Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.name: isSuspended
Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: Allow jobs in queue to be executed.

Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: All operations in all queues will be removed

Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: All operations with this tag in all queues will be removed

Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.name: cancelOperations(uuid:)
Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: All operations with this uuid in all queues will be removed

Classes/SwiftQueueManager.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: Blocks the current thread until all of the receiver’s queued and executing operations finish executing.

Classes/JobBuilder.html#/s:10SwiftQueue1.abstract: Custom parameters will be forwarded to create method
